readable.title: 2447284966_d6bbdb4b6e
readable.content: A little boy is holding a skinny baseball bat while standing between two rows of blue seats . A small boy dressed in a black sweatshirt with a logo on it , holds a red bat in front of blue stadium seats . A young boy in a team sweatshirt is in a sports stadium near blue seats swinging a red bat . A young boy practices his bat swing while in the stands with blue seats . The boy wearing a black shirt and blue jeans is holding a red baseball bat .
